"Been enjoying Gathering?": "Outside the City, there's a wealth of vegetables, fruits, Ores and Tames meat to be harvested."
"Those fresh ingredients and strong materials are sure to benefit you in your battles to come."
"Photon Quartz is a jagged aqua Ore that sticks out of certain rocks. Trinite is an Ore with a beautiful concentric stripes."
"These stones can both be used for strengthening weapons as well."
"...Though personally, I think they could be made into some lovely conversation pieces..."
"I should also mention that Photon Quartz is especially required in the making of Multi-Weapons."
"The place you can find them is in Northern Aelio. So go try finding some! ...You know the drill. Hah-hah-hah!"
"Well, whenever you'd like to learn about Ores, just let me know."
